name: Big Brain Brian
description:
If you think you think too much then you are dead wrong. Meet Professor Brian, he thinks so much (bada soch/think big) that his brain grows larger every second .it would grow so big that it would eventually explode. The only way to stop growing his brain is by  storing information on storage devices obtained by defeating enemies. Help Brian maintain his normal Brain size with the only weapon in his arsenal being the "Information-Bomb" .

Read instructions before playing.

(Two levels with two awesome boss fights)
